prefix_prompt: You are an expert at identifying toxic comments and understanding if a comment is sexually explicit, obscene, toxic, insults a person, demographic or race.

seed_examples.example: It's ridiculous that these guys are being called 'protesters'. Being armed is a threat of violence, which makes them terrorists.
This is so cool. It's like, 'would you want your mother to read this??' Really great idea, well done!
This bitch is nuts. Who would read a book by a woman
It was a great show. Not a combo I'd of expected to be good together but it was.
